item.title: Not exactly client but to do with there site
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“N00b1, post:3, topic:38969”]done that or crtl+u lol but go back a week or two the source was diff this is what it is now

<html><head>
<title>RuneScape - the massive online adventure game by Jagex Ltd</title>
<meta name="Description" content="RuneScape is a massive 3d multiplayer adventure, with monsters to kill, quests to complete, and treasure to win. You control your own character who will improve and become more powerful the more you play.">
<meta name="Keywords" content="Runescape, Jagex, free, games, online, multiplayer, magic, spells, java, MMORPG, MPORPG, gaming">
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="/favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
</head>

<frameset cols=* frameborder=0 border=0>
<noframes>
<body bgcolor="black" text="white">
<h3>RuneScape</h3>
RuneScape is a massive 3d multiplayer adventure, with monsters
to kill, quests to complete, and treasure to win. You control your
own character who will improve and become more powerful the more you play.
<p>This site uses frames, but your browser doesn't support them.</p>
<p>To play Runescape and browse our website, please download a recent web browser
such as <a href='http://www.microsoft.com'>Microsoft Internet Explorer</a> or <a href='http://www.mozilla.org'>Mozilla Firefox</a>.</p>
<br><br>
<p>The Jagex Team.</p>
</body>
</noframes>
<frame src="http://www.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/title.ws" noresize scrolling="auto">
</frameset>
</html>

if you go to http://www.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/title.ws you get the actual source of the site.

but go to the forms log in page or the screen when you are actually playing rs and try it you get the above source again so how can you get the source for those pages i could probs do it in a hour if i actually opened up my eyes just saying thou they have masked it[br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2006, 06:38:35 PM[/size][hr]look at the difference between them p.s happy xmas 12:00[/quote]

[code].news dt { font-weight: bold; clear: right;}
.newsdate { float: right; }
.news a { margin-top: 0.5em; }
.newscontainer { margin-left: 290px; margin-bottom: 110px; }
img { border: 0; }
.buttons { width: 457px; height: 110px; position: relative; margin: 0; }
.buttons a{ display: block; position: absolute; width: 180px; height: 80px; margin: 5px; background: #808080; font-weight: bold; color: white; text-align: center; border: 5px outset #909090;}
.buttons a:hover { background: #A0A0A0; border-color: #ffffff}
#button-left {left: 15px; top: 0px;}
#button-left span.lev1 {background-image: url(‘http://www.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/img/title2/doublebutton_create.gif’);}
#button-right {right: 15px; top: 0px;}
#button-right span.lev1 { background-image: url(‘http://www.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/img/title2/doublebutton_play.gif’);}
span.lev1 { display: block; cursor: pointer; cursor: hand; position: absolute; top: -10px; left: -10px; width: 200px; height: 100px;}
a:hover span.lev1 { background-position: 0 100px;}

  • html fieldset.menu {position: relative; padding-top: 10px; display : block; margin-top: 15px;}
  • html fieldset.menu legend {position: absolute; top: -7px;}

16-Jan-2007Interfaces and spooky wallpapers
As promised in this month's Behind the Scenes announcement, we've taken a good look at some of the most commonly used interfaces and menus in the game and given them a makeover. We've also got a new set of images for your computer's background, featuring the creepy undead monsters that are due for a graphical improvement later this month, plus a stunning picture of everyone's favourite Wise Old Man in a pensive mood...
Read more...
10-Jan-2007Players' Gallery and QuestHelp
Postie Pete, in association with the finest art galleries and critics on RuneScape, proudly presents the latest in fashionable artistry...
Read more...
10-Jan-2007Contact!
Deep within the Kharidian Desert, south of the Shantay Pass, unrest is growing within the cities of Menaphos and Sophanem. With the threat of the Devourer still lurking in the shadows, the High Priest of Icthlarin has deemed it time to make 'contact' with citizens of Sophanem who had fled to Menaphos...
Read more...
04-Jan-2007Barbarian Assault
It's here! Behold the glory that is… Barbarian Assault! Team up with four other players and work together to find fame and fortune in this brand new multiplayer minigame.
Read more...
04-Jan-2007Scientific Breakthrough Announced!
From her room in spooky Draynor Manor, Ava the eccentric scientist has launched an upgrade of the device she invents in the Animal Magnetism quest. Read on for details...
Read more...
Browse the news archives
This webpage and its contents are copyright © 1999 - 2007 Jagex Ltd.
Use of this website is subject to our Terms+Conditions and Privacy policy

[/code]
